New Records: Edwards knocked down six threes tonight, marking the seventh time this season he has finished a game with 6+ made threes (26th career)... Tonight’s performance moved Edwards past Trae Young and D’Angelo Russell for the most career games with 6+ made threes by a player aged 23 or younger in NBA history.
Key Match Events: Anthony Edwards led the way with 37 points, eight assists, and seven rebounds. Hitting some of the game’s biggest shots, Edwards also made NBA history on Monday.
